items.sentence: The only bed Tom has ever slept in is his own.
I can\'t bear to see good food going to waste.
I can\'t do it by myself. You need to help me.
Why don\'t you try to get up earlier tomorrow?
Tom appears unwilling to do anything about it.
I think Tom hates it when Mary makes him wait.
There\'s got to be a better way of doing this.
I have a friend who can speak French fluently.
Tom wants me to come back to see him tomorrow.
Tom was able to do everything he needed to do.
